channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Smart Switch PC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Smart Switch PC

item.title: CVE-2023-30673|2024-08-02T14:28:52.081Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smart%20switch%20pc
item.description: Improper validation of integrity check vulnerability in Smart Switch PC prior to version 4.3.23052_1 allows local attackers to delete arbitrary directory using directory junction.
